Welcome to GIMod’s documentation!¶

Contents:

  • The GUI
    • The Toolbar
    • Property Table
    • Mesh Options
    • Plotting Area
  • Examples
    • starting with a sketch you made

GIMod stands for Graphical Interface for basic Model creation. It is intended to make the creation of your basic model with/for GIMLi easier. The result is a poly (.poly) or mesh (.bms) which can be further used in your own script. GIMod is written and tested with python 3.6.0, matplotlib 2.0.0 and Qt5.

Prerequisities¶

  • python
  • Qt4/Qt5
  • GIMLi
  • (OpenCV)

Installation¶

Install GIMod from GitHub by cloning it: git clone https://github.com/frodo4fingers/gimod.git

Contribute¶

If you are having issues, please feel free to write a ticket.

License¶

This project is licensed under the GPL-3.0.
